page.title: 16WASTE DISPOSAL IN HAILSHAM
page.content: In the Waste Disposal Unit there are 19 lorries in use and 7 spares that are old. The waste disposal unit has roughly 152 tons of rubbish coming in every day. Dustmen would like people to be careful what they put in dustbins. Broken glass can be dangerous to the dustmen even though they wear gloves. Some people put metal in dustbins and this can ruin the mechanism of the dust lorry. Chemicals, asbestos and bricks are also dangerous. At the moment there are 80 workers but soon there will be fewer employed workers because wheel dustbins will be used and Can Banks introduced. Glass is the only rubbish to be recycled at the moment.
